attributes.action: Force banks to remove the 1 UKP surcharge for "administration reasons" on overseas purchases and the charges for withdrawing cash when abroad.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lloyds TSB confirms on their website: When you make a purchase (not a cash withdrawal) abroad or in a currency other than sterling – we will charge you £1 (except if you have a Platinum or Premier debit card). This fee will also apply to internet or home shopping card purchases that are not made in sterling. (This fee will not be charged on accounts held in the Channel Islands or the Isle of Man, nor on WWS Executive Gold and WWS Executive Platinum accounts.)   

Given the current recession, and that this is now a public bank, this clause should be removed to help improve trade.
